inclusion.criterion: recruited from the PI's private practice
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able and willing to undergo a noninvasive 24 hour pH probe study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: noninvasive 24 hour esophageal pH probe monitoring
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mucosa may be sprayed with topical 4% lidocaine for comfort
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: procedure is the standard for diagnosis of extraesophageal (laryngopharyngeal) reflux
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: done in accordance with manufacturer guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient may have a diminished risk of recurrence of their nasal polyposis
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of surgical treatment for reflux disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of allergic or adverse reaction to Prevacid
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has nasal polyposis and is willing to undergo a noninvasive pH probe study. They are not currently taking a PPI and can take one as part of the study.
